apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this tender emoji depicts a loving embrace between a man with a medium-light skin tone and a woman with a dark skin tone, their faces gently touching in a kiss. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading imbues the figures with a soft, volumetric presence, while realistic lighting highlights their affectionate connection.  The smooth gradients and rounded edges of their forms convey a sense of intimacy and romantic expression, perfect for sharing heartfelt moments in digital communication.
